articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Nick Kyrgios wins in Houston while pulling off another audacious tweener shot - ABC News
articles.description: Nick Kyrgios defeats American Mackenzie McDonald in Houston, and pulls out an incredible tweener shot along the way. Watch the footage.
articles.content:
Nick Kyrgios has got his US clay season underway in fine fashion, recording a three-set win at the ATP Tour event in Houston.
The Aussie wildcard came from behind to defeat Mackenzie McDonald 4-6, 6… [+1433 chars]

articles.title: In space, Russians and Americans remain 'dear friends': Astronaut - CNA
articles.description: WASHINGTON: After nearly a week back on Earth, NASA astronaut Mark Vande Hei said on Tuesday (Apr 5) the relationship between US astronauts and Russian cosmonauts remained positive while on board the International Space Station, despite their countries' animo…

articles.author: Dan Collyns, Tom Phillips
articles.title: Fuel protests prompt Lima curfew as Ukraine crisis touches South America - The Guardian
articles.description: Peru’s embattled president takes drastic action as fertiliser and fuel prices soar and Brazil seeks to open Indigenous territory to mining
articles.content: Perus embattled president Pedro Castillo has banned residents of the capital, Lima, from leaving their homes in an attempt to quell nationwide protests over soaring fuel and fertiliser prices caused … [+3843 chars]

articles.title: 메디포뉴스 - 메디포뉴스
articles.description: 바이엘은 자렐토(성분명 리바록사반)가 제71회 미국심장학회 연례학술대회(American Congress of Cardiology’s 71st Annual Scientific Session, ACC 2022)에서 만성 신장병(Chronic Kidney Disease, CKD)을 동반한 비판막성 심방세동(Non-Valvular Atrial Fibrillatio
